name: CLIC

projects.title: Porsche
projects.description: We teamed up with Porsche for an exciting shoot, capturing the sleek elegance of their new model Porsche Macan.

projects.title: Isabelle Victoria
projects.description: For the Travel shoot with Isabelle Victoria, we ventured to the largest tree in Bali. The goal was to boost her social media presence with photos that truly capture her unique style. We spent a day planning and another day shooting, integrating some fresh A.I. techniques into the video. Isabelle Victoria, with her impressive 100k+ Instagram followers, is a high-profile client, making this project a key step in enhancing her travelbrand.

projects.title: Kimman
projects.description: For the 65th anniversary of Kimman beeing a Jaguar dealer they hosted a Rally with over 80 Jaguars driving a route to different locations. We were able to film the Rally and create an aftermovie for it.

projects.title: Be Braive
projects.description:
75% of mental health problems arise before the age of 25. We believe this can be different. We want to give young people confidence, so they can discover their own strengths, make healthy choices, and handle stress. So that fear no longer holds them back, and they can make the most of life.

Director of Photography: Tiemen van Dijk.

projects.title: LIDL
projects.description:
For the 25th anniversary of LIDL, the internal team organized a sports outing with the aim of visiting several LIDL suppliers, including Vergeer Holland Cheese.

With a team of cyclists, the trip began and ended with a good drink and a unique experience.

projects.title: KPMG Innovation Cafe
projects.description:
The first-ever organized Innovation Cafe within the S&O innovation community. On one hand, it helps better understand the business challenge, and on the other, it provides inspiration to colleagues on various topics. This cafe serves as a hub for innovation within KPMG.

We created a short impression video with interviews about the expectations of this cafe and how it intrigues them in their daily work.

projects.title: Capital Kitchen
projects.description:
We recently had the pleasure of collaborating with Capital Kitchen to highlight some of their signature dishes and showcase the stunning ambiance of their establishment.
Our goal was to capture the essence of their culinary artistry, focusing on both the visual appeal of their dishes and the inviting atmosphere of the venue.

projects.title: Alliander Podcast
projects.description: For Alliander & De Bruismaker we had the opportunity to edit an aftermovie of a 30 minute   podcast, within a timeframe of 2 hours for it to be shown to 150+ directors of Alliander itself.

projects.title: Madeira
projects.description:
I brought out my FPV drone in Madeira to capture the island’s breathtaking beauty from an entirely fresh and unique perspective.

Over the course of five days, I explored the most remote and stunning parts of the island with my DJI Avata, soaking in the incredible landscapes. To truly experience Madeira’s hidden gems, we hired a scooter and ventured off the beaten path to capture shots that showcase the island’s rugged charm and natural wonder.

projects.title: De Zorg Laten Werken
projects.description: In this campaign from KINASE, healthcare workers all over the Netherlands were celebrated by cooling down with an ice cream for their daily efforts. With this campaign, we were able to portray their strength through a unique video.

projects.title: Noizy
projects.description: We had the opportunity to shoot a live performance for Noizy, Albania's most renowned rapper with over 1 million Instagram followers. Despite the challenging conditions—limited space and no designated areas for videographers or photographers—we captured the energy of the concert from within the crowd, adding a raw and immersive perspective to the footage.

projects.title: Zoku
projects.description:
We conducted a swift video and photo shoot at Zoku, focusing on capturing the essence of their coffee culture.
The project included filming a dynamic coffee b-roll short to highlight the vibrant atmosphere and taking detailed images of the work cafe itself, showcasing its unique ambiance and design.

projects.title: Hojza
projects.description: Video and photoshoot for Hojza Club in Albania, capturing the energy of their jungle-themed event. We produced an engaging aftermovie and dynamic photos to showcase the vibrant atmosphere, tailored for their social media presence

services.title: Videography
services.description: We specialize in creating captivating video content, from event coverage to commercials, focusing on delivering a professional and visually engaging experience.

services.title: Branding & Content Creation
services.description: We craft visually striking content that aligns with your brand’s identity, including everything from video production to social media management.

services.title: Photography
services.description: We provide professional photography services that capture the essence of your business, perfect for promoting events, restaurants, bars, and more.

services.title: Social Media Management
services.description: We focus on creating, curating, and managing content that enhances your social media presence, engaging your audience and boosting visibility.

aboutpara: Rick and Tiemen are a dynamic duo specializing in videography and photography. With years of experience across multiple industries, including events, hospitality, and corporate shoots, they bring a creative edge to every project. Whether it's scripting, shooting, or post-production, they handle it all with professionalism and passion.

resume.tagline: 👋 We are Rick and Tiemen, videographers, photographers, editors, and creative content specialists.
resume.description: Together, we’ve delivered standout content for various businesses. Rick focuses on travel videography and photography, while Tiemen has a strong background in commercial videography. Our skills range from scriptwriting to post-processing, including color grading, sound editing, and social media management. We love helping businesses showcase their best side.
